title: Antitrust Pt 2: The Populists
description: The second in a special 3-part series on antitrust law. Kate and Luigi talk with Lina Khan, author of the article “Amazon’s Antitrust Paradox,” and a member of the New Brandeis Movement, which believes that antitrust enforcement should be more broadly applied and not just rely on consumer welfare.
author: uchicagopodcasts@gmail.com (Chicago Booth Review)
content:encoded: The second in a special 3-part series on antitrust law.
